languages.text: "Какой же бедлам... Лорд-капитан, вы удовлетворены? Тогда, если позволите, давайте покинем этот балаган и обсудим все случившееся по пути".
"This is complete bedlam... Are you satisfied, Lord Captain? Then, may I suggest we leave this circus and discuss everything en route."
languages.original_text: "Какой же бедлам... Лорд-капитан, вы удовлетворены? Тогда, если позволите, давайте покинем этот балаган и обсудим все случившееся по пути".

traits.locale_text: "This is complete bedlam... Are you satisfied, Lord Captain? Then, may I suggest we leave this circus and discuss everything en route."
"This is complete bedlam... Are you satisfied, Lord Captain? Then, may I suggest we leave this circus and discuss everything en route."
"This is complete bedlam... Are you satisfied, Lord Captain? Then, may I suggest we leave this circus and discuss everything en route."
"This is complete bedlam... Are you satisfied, Lord Captain? Then, may I suggest we leave this circus and discuss everything en route."

languages.text: “这简直是一片混乱……您满意了吗，舰长大人？既然如此，我建议咱们从这场闹剧中抽身，边走边讨论这里发生的事情。”
languages.original_text: "This is complete bedlam... Are you satisfied, Lord Captain? Then, may I suggest we leave this circus and discuss everything en route."

traits.locale_text: “这简直是一片混乱……您满意了吗，舰长大人？既然如此，我建议咱们从这场闹剧中抽身，边走边讨论这里发生的事情。”

languages.text: «Esto es un caos absoluto... ¿Satisfech{mf|o|a}, Lord Capitán? Entonces sugiero que abandonemos este circo y hablemos de todo por el camino».
languages.original_text: "This is complete bedlam... Are you satisfied, Lord Captain? Then, may I suggest we leave this circus and discuss everything en route."

traits.locale_text: «Esto es un caos absoluto... ¿Satisfech{mf|o|a}, Lord Capitán? Entonces sugiero que abandonemos este circo y hablemos de todo por el camino».

languages.text: 「なんという混乱だ…満足されましたか、ロード・キャプテン？では、このサーカスを去り、その途中ですべてを話し合うことをご提案してもよろしいでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "This is complete bedlam... Are you satisfied, Lord Captain? Then, may I suggest we leave this circus and discuss everything en route."

traits.locale_text: 「なんという混乱だ…満足されましたか、ロード・キャプテン？では、このサーカスを去り、その途中ですべてを話し合うことをご提案してもよろしいでしょうか？」

languages.text: "Das ist ein einziges Tollhaus ... Seid Ihr zufrieden, Lord Captain? Darf ich dann vorschlagen, dass wir diesen Zirkus hinter uns lassen und alles unterwegs besprechen?"
languages.original_text: "This is complete bedlam... Are you satisfied, Lord Captain? Then, may I suggest we leave this circus and discuss everything en route."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ein einziges Tollhaus ... Seid Ihr zufrieden, Lord Captain? Darf ich dann vorschlagen, dass wir diesen Zirkus hinter uns lassen und alles unterwegs besprechen?"

languages.text: « C'est le chaos le plus complet... Vous êtes {mf|satisfait|satisfaite}, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Dans ce cas, regagnons les ponts supérieurs, nous discuterons de tout ça en chemin. »
languages.original_text: "This is complete bedlam... Are you satisfied, Lord Captain? Then, may I suggest we leave this circus and discuss everything en route."

traits.locale_text: « C'est le chaos le plus complet... Vous êtes {mf|satisfait|satisfaite}, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Dans ce cas, regagnons les ponts supérieurs, nous discuterons de tout ça en chemin. »

languages.text: "Dingo'nun ahırına dönmüş burası... Memnun musunuz Lord Kaptan? O hâlde bu rezillikten uzaklaşıp olan biteni yolda konuşalım."
languages.original_text: "This is complete bedlam... Are you satisfied, Lord Captain? Then, may I suggest we leave this circus and discuss everything en route."

traits.locale_text: "Dingo'nun ahırına dönmüş burası... Memnun musunuz Lord Kaptan? O hâlde bu rezaleti terk edip olan biteni yolda konuşalım."
